name: Paulo Shakarian
content: Paulo Shakarian | ASU Search Paulo Shakarian Adjunct Faculty, Center for Cybersecurity and Trusted Foundations Affiliates [email protected] Long Bio Paulo Shakarian, Ph.D. is an Adjutant Faculty member at Arizona State University.  His research interests include logic programming, artificial intelligence, abductive learning, data mining, machine learning, and computer security.  Previously, he held a tenured position at ASU's School of Computing and AI.  He is currently a full Professor at Syracuse University. Education Ph.D. Computer Science, University of Maryland-College Park 2011 M.S. Computer Science, University of Maryland-College Park 2009 B.S. Computer Science, U.S. Military Academy 2002 Video Google Scholar URL https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Xii5xrIAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao Research Interests artificial intelligence, logic, machine
